scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && yarn dev" "cd admin && yarn dev"
scripts.devhttps: concurrently "cd server && yarn devhttps" "cd admin && yarn devhttps"
scripts.install-all: cd admin && yarn install && cd ../server && yarn install && cd ../mobile && yarn install
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && yarn start" "cd admin && yarn start"
scripts.starthttps: concurrently "cd server && yarn starthttps" "cd admin && yarn starthttps"
scripts.translate: cd admin/src/locales && node parseFromCSV.mjs && cd ../../../mobile/locales && node parseFromCSV.mjs
scripts.upgrade-all: ncu -u && cd server && ncu -u && cd ../admin && ncu -u && cd ../mobile && ncu -u && yarn install-all
